labels.name: epic
labels.value: TC_55!048 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Ausztrália', 'Greece', 'Japán', 'ETF-ek', 'Ipar'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Ausztrália', 'Greece', 'Japán', 'ETF-ek']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Egyesült Királyság', 'Greece', 'Olaszország', 'Energia', 'ETF-ek'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: []

are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: []

only filters are displayed: ['Greece', 'Szingapúr', 'Svájc']
